4 Greendale Road, Coventry, Warcs. CV5 8LN  
allen@dyts.uk • +44  7973  338811 • https://www.linkedin.com/in/allenwilkes  
Personal Profile   
 
I am a self -motivated, accomplished cybersecurity systems engineer , with a rare ability to explain 
technical subjects , using storytelling and analogies with a non -technical audience  to ensure easy 
consumption .  
Focused and innovative in my approach, I demonstrate excellent presentation, comm unicat ion and 
analytical problem -solving  skills , with  hybrid experience across sales, technical, business object ives 
and the commercials . 
Being dynamic and  technically credible , with the ability to quickly understand  the customer’s key 
business drivers , I am able  to build strong trusted advisor relationships and de sign integrated 
solutions.  
Key Skills & Achievements  
 
 Won the Westcon presales engineer of the year award  because of my strong knowledge of the 
vendor sector (cybersecurity), my passion for the subject matter and for being a ‘consummate 
professional ’. 
 As part of the Westcon Palo Alto Networks team achieved 35% growth for the period Aug 19 
>Jul 20 , with  March 20 being  our first $10M quarter  and closing at a record $6.7M  in July 20  
($2.88M July 19),  i.e. 132%  growth.  
 Generated $250k of partner sales pipeline by highlighting risky applications, threats , 
vulnerabilities and poor security posture with new prospects  using the Palo Alto Networks 
Security Lifecycle Review (SLR)  tool. 
 98% Palo Alto Networks renewal rate m aintain ed using the Best Practise Assessment (BPA) 
tool, helping existing customers maximise their return on investment and strengthen their 
security posture.  
 Use my strong presentation skills to explain  technical subjects to non-technical team members.  
For example, I helped a n aggregates  company using IoT & OT to understand the need for a 
Zero-Trust methodology for their 200+ site flat network.  
 Delivering Zero Trust & complimentary s ecurity workshops to c -suite executives, using 
storytelling with analogies and humour to bring the subject matter to life so that it is clearly 
understood.  
 Created and ran a series on Prisma & Cortex enablement sessions to help firewall partners 
onboard the new go to markets from Palo Alto Networ ks and drive diversity within the 
infrastructure partner community.  
 Initiated a program to deliver a series of Palo Alto Networks enablement sessions in order to 
drive more business from Westcon’s Unified Communications partners.  
 Whilst I owned my own comp any (DYTS), built a 7 -year trusted advisor relationship with The  
Hughes Group, Mercedes Benz Franchise. Won  many projects including a £250k Citrix Server 
farm deployment and a £100k WatchGuard firewall and wireless deployment into their complex 
car repair workshops environment.  
 Won the Teneo DNA award for commitment to excellence for  finding solutions to complex 
problems; I persuaded a sceptical customer in the construction industry  that the solution I was 
suggesting solved their pain points by building a proof of concept of how to deploy and manage 
building site remote IT networks . 
 30+ years’ experience in providing global IT  security solutions , managing solutions for 
businesses and teams of all sizes across the autom otive,  construction, aviation, defence & retail 
industries . 
Employment History  
 
Palo Alto Networks Pre -Sales, Westcon UK & I , Bracknell  May 2019  – Present  
My role at Westcon is to help increase Palo Alto Networks sales, interacting  with the sales teams  
and expand ing the partner network . Activities include,  technically qualifying  sales opportunities, 
present  partner enablement, architecting zero -trust designs, demonstrations  and supporting the 
wider partner community , whilst deliver ing additional revenue generation activities using Security  
Lifecycle Reviews (SLRs) and Best Practise Assessments (BPAs).  
Achievements and Responsibilities  
 Architect Palo Alto Networks solutions, creating Bill of Materials (BoM) , quotations  & proof of 
concepts for partners, demonstrating the Westcon value  add and why Westcon are  their

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
